update.description:
Fix offline update. Fix firewall Internal Traffic rules. Add user proxy password page. Several minor fixes in GUI pages. Language updates.
Add lsof, usb_modeswitch. Upgrade acpid to 2.0.1, dhcpcd to 5.1.4, iptables to 1.4.6, kernel to 2.6.27.44, mdadm to 3.1.1, nano to 2.2.1, ntpd to 4.2.6, pciutils to 3.1.5, smartmontools to 5.39, several others.
Upgrade openvpn server to 2.1.1, you have to save the OpenVPN config before restart.
Mandatory reboot after upgrade.
